title: American-style jumbo triple chocolate muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '50g cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon bicarbonate of soda', '100g soured cream', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 medium eggs', '100ml semi-skimmed milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon chocolate extract', '75g dark chocolate chips', '75g white chocolate chips']
